title: Obari
author: Obari
content: I came across this image below on a Whatsapp status and I had to screenshot because it got my attention because I saw how much punctuation really workedMost times, i don't punctuate my writings and when I do, I really don't do it well because i don't want someone reading my post with a different meaning from what I wrote.So I had to brought this issue to the forum as a wake up callÂ  for us to punctate our writings, as this will go a long way, for better understanding of our writings by others.N/B: I hold no right to the image and I got it from a Whatsapp status and aso tried searching for the original post to get the link to it but couldn't find it, so you guys should bear with me please.
